ALDEV.PA.summary: Devernois S.A. provides clothing for women in France and internationally. It offers shirts, tops, dresses, skirts, sweaters, vests, pants, trousers, jackets, coats, and knitwear. The company also provides accessories, such as scarves, hats, masks, and jewelry, as well as leather bags, shoes, gloves, and belts. It sells its products through 6 stores in Belgium, 67 stores in France, 3 stores in Portugal, 3 stores in Royaume-Uni, 2 stores in Spain, and 2 stores in Switzerland, as well as through online. The company was founded in 1927 and is based in Le Coteau, France. Devernois S.A. is a subsidiary of HSTB SARL.

BUI.PA.summary: Barbara Bui SA engages in the design and marketing of luxury clothing and accessories for women in Europe, Asia, Africa, and North America. The company operates in two segments, Retail and Wholesale. The Retail segment offers PrÃªt-Ã -porter and leather goods. The Wholesale segment distributes collections and accessories. Barbara Bui SA offers jackets and outerwear, tops, dresses and skirts, trousers, knitwear, shoes, bags, and accessories. The company serves individuals and stores. It offers its products through its Website, phone, and email, as well as 2021 stores. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

GJAJ.PA.summary: Groupe JAJ distributes clothing, shoes, and accessories. The company offers clothes, textile goods, leather goods, shoes, and accessories of Schott trademarks. It offers products through a network of agents, Webstores, stores, and shops in Europe. The company was formerly known as JAJ Distribution and changed its name to Groupe JAJ. Groupe JAJ is headquartered in Montreuil, France.

MLONE.PA.summary: Body One SA operates an online apparel for ladies. It offers bottoms, lingerie, shorts, trousers, bikinis, and sportswear. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Pantin, France.

MLSML.PA.summary: Smalto Holding SA designs and sells men's apparel and accessories. The company men's apparel includes shirts, costumes, coats, trousers, sweaters, T-shirt and polos, and jackets; and accessories comprise cufflinks, belts, shoes, gloves, glasses, and suitcases. Smalto Holding SA was formerly known as DS Holding SA and changed its name to Smalto Holding SA in May 2009. The company is based in Paris, France.
